name: Highland Rim Aviation
about: Highland Rim Aviation, LLC, based in Springfield and Nashville, Tennessee, is dedicated to providing exceptional flight training experiences. Our mission is to offer the ultimate in flight education, whether you aspire to become a certified private pilot or pursue advanced aviation certifications. Owned and operated by Thomas and Amy Jones, our team includes skilled and experienced instructors who deliver individualized training courses designed to expedite your learning process. Known for outstanding customer service, Highland Rim Aviation ensures a supportive and professional environment for all students. We are committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals with expertise and care.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
Intro Flight
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Private Pilot
Instrument
Multi-Engine"]
